remarks: Membership in a power class.  Theorem 86 of [Suppes] p. 47.  Derived from ~ elpwg .  In form of VD deduction with ` ph ` and ` ps ` as variable virtual hypothesis collections based on Mario Carneiro's metavariable concept. ~ elpwgded is ~ elpwgdedVD using conventional notation.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 23-Apr-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
elpwgdedVD.1 $e |- (. ph ->. A e. _V ). $.
elpwgdedVD.2 $e |- (. ps ->. A C_ B ). $.
elpwgdedVD $p |- (. (. ph ,. ps ). ->. A e. ~P B ). $.
